sentences.en: " Very well. There's the ax.
sentences.cn: “ 好了好了, 去拿斧子吧.

sentences.en: A well - aimed blow from his ax felled her to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他用斧子对准,把她砍倒在地.

sentences.en: Again he wielded his ax.
sentences.cn: 他再次挥舞了他的斧头。

sentences.en: Everyone would say you have an ax to grind.
sentences.cn: 每个人都会说您别有用心.

sentences.en: He carried a large ax.
sentences.cn: 他带了一把大斧.

sentences.en: He claimed to be disinterested, but I knew he had an ax to grind.
sentences.cn: 他宣称无私利，但我知道他另有企图

sentences.en: He grinds ax on the grindstone.
sentences.cn: 他在磨石上磨斧。

sentences.en: He hacked the box apart with the ax.
sentences.cn: 他用斧头把盒子劈开.

sentences.en: He struck off the branch with a single chop of the ax.
sentences.cn: 他一斧子就砍掉了那根树枝.

sentences.en: He took his ax and struck the trunk of the tree. Whack. Whack. Whack.
sentences.cn: 他举起斧子砍树干，咔，咔，咔。

sentences.en: How do you sharpen your ax?
sentences.cn: 如何磨尖你的斧头呢？

sentences.en: I said it was all well and good to let them strike the first blow, but if they hit us hard below the belt, we should take a meat ax and cut their hands off.
sentences.cn: 我说，我们容忍共和党人先出手，向我们发动攻击，这也就罢了，但如果他们不正当地抨击我们的要害部位，我们就应该拿起一把剁肉的斧头，将他们的手砍断。

sentences.en: I tapered the end of the fence post with an ax.
sentences.cn: 我用斧头将篱笆桩顶端削尖.

sentences.en: In fact, a cleaver is a class of ax.
sentences.cn: 实际上，切肉刀也是斧子的一种。

sentences.en: The ax handle broke one day.
sentences.cn: 有一天,斧把断了.

sentences.en: The ax severed his head from his body.
sentences.cn: 斧头使他身首分离.

sentences.en: The boss gave Jack the ax.
sentences.cn: 老板解雇了杰克.

sentences.en: The firemen splintered the locked door with an ax.
sentences.cn: 消防队员用斧子劈开了锁着的房门.

sentences.en: The handle of the ax broke one day.
sentences.cn: 有一天斧柄断了.

sentences.en: With one stroke of his ax , he had cut the tree down.
sentences.cn: 他一斧子就砍倒了这棵树.
